title: Legoland Discovery Center Schaumburg
text:
Daily 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. Last admission is at 5:00 p.m. 
Admission: 
Adults, $19; Children, $15; children 2 and under are free. Unlimited year long pass, $40. (prices as of 06/2011 -- subject to change) 
Directions to Legoland from Downtown Chicago: 
I-90 West to I-53 South to Higgins Road. Turn right onto Higgins Road, then turn right onto Martingale Rd. Legoland is located in the Streets of Woodfield shopping complex. 
Legoland Website: 
http://www.legolanddiscoverycenter.com/chicago/en/index.htm 
About the Legoland Discovery Center: 
The Legoland Discovery Center is THE destination for the LEGO nut in your life. Legoland features a number of different attractions such as: A 4D cinema Dragon Ride - travel through a medieval castle filled with moving LEGO models Adventure Trail - kids wander through a "jungle" on the lookout for LEGO animals Miniland - see Chicago built in miniature with LEGOs, including a replica of the Sears Tower made up of 190,000 bricks LEGO Build and Test Area - guests build LEGO vehicles and then get to test them out on a ramp Model Builders Workshop - a tutorial on creating LEGO masterpieces Hall of Fame - view famous fictional heroes built out of LEGOs Soft Play Zone - an open play area with a jungle gym and climbing wall Factory Tour - a display that demonstrates how LEGOs are made Legoland also features a cafe that serves food and drink, making it easy to spend the day.
